title: Liverpool
name: Merseyside Maritime Museum
content: Dedicated to the maritime history of the city, complete with galleries on customs and excise and emigration to the New World. There are also a number of vessels to see, such as the Mersey river tug ''Brocklebank'' and the river cargo carrier ''Wyncham''. A museum permanent gallery is devoted to the [[Titanic]], Lusitania and Forgotten Empress.
